newsitem.title: UK: IBCA rate Spain's Caja de Ahorros de Valencia.
newsitem.headline: IBCA rate Spain's Caja de Ahorros de Valencia.

text.p: IBCA, the European rating agency, said on Thursday it had assigned Caja de Ahorros de Valencia, Castellon y Alicante (Bancaja) a long term rating of A plus and a short term rating of A1.

"A strong regional presence and professional and conservative management approach should help ensure continued high profitability for the group, despite intense competition from national and regional banks," IBCA said in a statement.
Bancaja is the parent of Spain's ninth largest banking group and the fourth largest savings bank by total assets, at end-1996, IBCA said.
